alert.note: Alert for Corson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 7:27PM MDT until June 29 at 8:30PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Corson County in north central South Dakota... * Until 830 PM MDT. * At 727 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bullhead, or 18 miles west of Mclaughlin, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Bullhead around 735 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Mclaughlin, Mahto and Kenel. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
